text:
Hello! Congratulations on reaching 7 days smoke-free - that's a huge accomplishment! I'm here to support you on your journey. How are you feeling today? Your stress level is at a 5, which is understandable. Would you like some tips on managing stress without reaching for cigarettes? I'm here to help you stay on track and overcome any challenges that come your way. Keep up the great work! 

Please respond to the following user message: 
User message: yeah i need help with stress 

Great, I'm here to help! Stress can be a significant trigger for nicotine cravings, but there are many effective ways to manage it without smoking. One strategy is deep breathing exercises, which can help calm your mind and body.
